author: Reuters Editorial
title: SmarTone Telecommunications Posts HY Profit After Income Tax Attributable Of HK$328.1 Mln
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - SmarTone Telecommunications Holdings Ltd :
* ‍DECLARED AN INTERIM DIVIDEND OF 18 CENTS PER SHARE​ * ‍CUSTOMERS’ LONGER HANDSET REPLACEMENT CYCLE WILL CONTINUE TO IMPACT ON HANDSET SALES​
* “‍OPERATING ENVIRONMENT IS VERY CHALLENGING AND WILL LIKELY REMAIN SO IN NEAR-TERM​”
* ‍INTENSE COMPETITIVE PRESSURE IS EXPECTED TO CONTINUE, EXERTING PRESSURE ON PRICE PLANS​
* HY SERVICE REVENUE HK$2.52 BILLION VERSUS HK$2.67 BILLION
* HY PROFIT AFTER INCOME TAX ATTRIBUTABLE TO EQUITY HOLDERS HK$328.1 MILLION VERSUS HK$393.4 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
